# Phase 7 Archival - Quick Reference Card

## Documentation Specialist Agents - Fast Reference

### One-Line Command (Recommended)

```bash
cd C:\Users\sleep\.claude\skills\media-analysis && python archival.py [ticket-id] [WebEDI-ID] "[Company_Name]"
```

**Example:**
```bash
cd C:\Users\sleep\.claude\skills\media-analysis && python archival.py 13624970 WEB-456 "Ace Hardware"
```

---

## What Gets Archived Automatically

### From Phase 0 (processing/[ticket-id]/)
- [+] metadata.json
- [+] preliminary_analysis.md
- [+] Original ticket file (PDF, images, audio, video)

### Generated by Script
- [+] resolution_summary.md (timeline + metrics)
- [+] phase0_metrics.json (performance data)

### You Still Need to Add Manually
- [ ] investigation_report.md (your investigation PRD)
- [ ] customer_response files
- [ ] verification files (QA checklist, sign-off)
- [ ] Update customer history
- [ ] Update customer index

---

## Output Location

```
C:\Users\sleep\Documents\tickets\resolution\[WebEDI-ID]_[Company_Name]/
├── ticket_original/
│   ├── [file].pdf
│   └── metadata.json ← Phase 0
├── analysis/
│   ├── preliminary_analysis.md ← Phase 0
│   ├── investigation_report.md ← You add this
│   └── notebooklm_citations.md ← You add this
├── customer_response/
│   ├── response_draft.md ← You add this
│   └── response_final.md ← You add this
├── verification/
│   ├── qa_checklist.md ← You add this
│   └── sign_off.md ← You add this
├── resolution_summary.md ← Auto-generated
└── phase0_metrics.json ← Auto-generated
```

---

## Verification Checklist

Phase 0 Archival (Automated):
- [ ] metadata.json in ticket_original/
- [ ] preliminary_analysis.md in analysis/
- [ ] Original file in ticket_original/
- [ ] resolution_summary.md generated
- [ ] phase0_metrics.json generated

Your Responsibilities:
- [ ] investigation_report.md saved to analysis/
- [ ] customer_response files saved
- [ ] verification files saved
- [ ] Customer history updated (include Phase 0 section)
- [ ] Customer index updated

---

## Troubleshooting

### "Phase 0 artifacts not found"
- Check if ticket went through Phase 0 media analysis
- Verify processing/[ticket-id]/ folder exists
- Script will continue without Phase 0 data (warning only)

### "Permission denied"
- Run from correct directory: C:\Users\sleep\.claude\skills\media-analysis
- Check tickets folder permissions: C:\Users\sleep\Documents\tickets\

### "Company name has spaces"
- Always use quotes: "Ace Hardware" not Ace Hardware
- Script will replace spaces with underscores in folder name

---

## Phase 0 Section for Customer History

Add this to customer history template:

```markdown
### Ticket #[ID] - [YYYY-MM-DD]
**Status**: [Resolved/In Progress/Escalated]
**Scale**: [L0/L1/L2/L3/L4]
**Complexity**: [Score 0-8]

**Summary**: [Brief description]
**Root Cause**: [Technical summary]
**Resolution**: [What was done]
**Time**: [Investigation time: Xs]

**Phase 0 Analysis:**
- **Extraction Method:** [Gemini/OCR/Hybrid]
- **Confidence:** [0.XX]
- **Time Saved:** ~3 minutes

**Documents**:
- Phase 0 Metadata: resolution/[folder]/ticket_original/metadata.json
- Phase 0 Analysis: resolution/[folder]/analysis/preliminary_analysis.md
- Investigation PRD: resolution/[folder]/analysis/investigation_[id].md
- Customer Response: resolution/[folder]/customer_response/response_[id].md
- Resolution Summary: resolution/[folder]/resolution_summary.md
- Phase 0 Metrics: resolution/[folder]/phase0_metrics.json
```

---

## Time Savings

- **Phase 0 extraction:** ~3 min saved (vs manual)
- **Automated archival:** ~2 min saved (vs manual copy)
- **Structured organization:** ~1 min saved (lookup)
- **Total per ticket:** ~6 minutes
- **Daily (10 tickets):** ~60 minutes
- **Annual:** ~240 hours

```bash
# Example
cd C:\Users\sleep\.claude\skills\media-analysis && python archival.py 13624970 WEB-456 "Ace Hardware"
```
